channel.title: Android Studio 3.1 on Haki Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Android Studio 3.1 on Haki Blog

item.title: Import new module to Android Project
item.description: Step 1. Download Module Unzip module after finish download Step 2. Import Module Follow the following steps: File > New > Import Module Choose Source Directory and Finish Go to Settings.gradle add include ':module_name' File > Project Structure > Dependencies > Add(+) OR Add implementation project(':sipservice') in build.gradle(App)
